title: Usage-Instances.Search.Output
description: Profile-aware output for the Usage-Instances.Search capability.

usage_instances.description: Detected usage instances for each asset.

asset_name.description: The asset for which usage was detected.

location.description: Location or system where the asset was observed in use.

evidence.description: Reference to evidence supporting the detected usage instance.

profile.description: Optional updated profile after applying profilePatch.

profilePatch.description: Optional patch representing modifications applied during execution.

governanceLabels.description: Optional governance labels for downstream classification.
